dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: Can you even imagine?  Who the hell would go to this a bastion of commercial excess?

dialogue.speaker: MANDELLA
dialogue.text: Well, I guess we're not, since we don't have dates .

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: Listen to you!  You sound like Betty, all pissed off because Archie is taking Veronica.

dialogue.speaker: MANDELLA
dialogue.text: Okay, okay, we won't go.  It's not like I have a dress anyway

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: You ' re looking at this from the wrong perspective.  We're making a statement.

dialogue.speaker: MANDELLA
dialogue.text: Oh, good.  Something new and different for us.
